GSD.product_version: versions from v5.9 to before v5.10.142
GSD.description:
clk: bcm: rpi: Prevent out-of-bounds access

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.142 by commit fcae47b2d23c81603b01f56cf8db63ed64599d34, it was introduced in version v5.9 by commit 93d2725affd65686792f4b57e49ef660f3c8c0f9. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: clk: bcm: rpi: Prevent out-of-bounds access
